price: (Allah) arababwira ati “Ntimutinye! Mu by’ukuri ndi kumwe namwe; ndumva nkanabona.”
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhāfā innanī maʿakumā asmaʿu wa-arā
